title: How to nerf Tahm
body:
Reduced Armour and base health but increased health at later levels
Q slow lowered

Bam, you just gave a champion some actual exploitable weaknesses both in lane and in the jungle.

replies.body: i hate those damn generic nerfs. damaging a 3rd of a champs max health as true damage is his strongest feature, and its not even his ultimate, hint hint

But nerfing his base stats and his slow reduces the potency of his ganks, reduces his durability in the jungle, opens up windows of counterplay for even the most immobile of champions before he waddles up to your face and eats you, makes him vulnerable to early game pressure and most importantly, he will have to wait until later in the game to unlock his high damage and utility.
He does magic damage, not true damage.
